title: my.showSharePanel
content:
# my.showSharePanel

2022-07-03 18:44

Use this API to trigger the sharing.

**Note:**

When using this API to trigger the sharing, pass the value `code` to the request parameter `from` in [page.onShareAppMessage](https://miniprogram.gcash.com/docs/miniprogram_gcash/mpdev/framework_page_page-mechanism#5c99a32c).

## Sample code

copy

```javascript
// .js
my.showSharePanel();
```
